                            document.addEventListener('optanonLoaded', function _onOptanonLoad() {
                                window.OneTrustLoaded = true;
                            });

class="Chrome__content"><div></div><div></div><div class="sc-fONwsr kqJjsk"><div class="Article__component Article__hasEntitlement"><div class="Zone__component Article__zone"><div class="Article__pageTop"><div class="Article__wrapper Article__topWrapper"><div class="Article__pageHead Article__pad"><a href="/travel/specials/spirit-of-india" target="_self"><div class="Article__branding">Spirit of India</div></a><h1 class="Article__title">India's 30 most beautiful places to visit</h1><div class="Article__subtitle">Maggie Hiufu Wong, CNN<!-- -->  <!-- -->Updated 13th April 2021</div></div><div class="Article__head Article__pad"><div class="SocialBar__component SocialBar__horizontal Article__socialBar"><span class="SocialBar__icon SocialBar__facebook">Facebook</span><span class="SocialBar__icon SocialBar__twitter">Twitter</span><span class="SocialBar__icon SocialBar__email">Email</span></div><div class="Article__entitlement"><div data-ad-branding="spirit_of_india" id="ad_mod_85a882a72"></div></div></div></div><div class="Hero__component"><div class="Hero__wrapper Hero__mobileGallery"><div class="Hero__gallery"><div class="Image__component Image__hasAspectRatio" style="padding-top:56.25%"><img alt="Beautiful India Valley of Flowers Flickr Alosh Bennett 4951216953" class="Image__image" class="Hero__galleryCta"><div class="Hero__galleryCtaIcon"></div><div class="Hero__galleryCtaText"><div class="Hero__label">View Gallery</div><div class="Hero__count">30<!-- --> Pictures</div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="Article__wrapper"><div class="Article__primary"><div><div class="Article__content"><div class="Article__pad"><div class="Article__body Article__hasReadMore" style="max-height:"><div class="EditorialNote__component"><div>Editor's Note  CNN's series often carry sponsorship originating from the countries and regions we profile. However, CNN retains full editorial control over all of its reports. Our <a href="https://edition.cnn.com/2015/01/02/world/sponsorships-policy/index.html" target="_blank">sponsorship policy</a>.</div></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_47C3B016-6E6C-9DE4-2BDB-CB62FF7B81B1"><cite class="Paragraph__cite">(CNN)  </cite><span><a href="http://www.cnn.com/travel/destinations/india">India</a> might just be the most colorful country in the world.</span></div><div><div class="Ad__component"><div class="Ad__tag Article__adBody Ad__hasLabel" id="ad_rect_atf_02"></div></div></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_604D12B8-BA74-2874-756F-CB6C8066CBC3"><span>It's a land of otherworldly landscapes for <a href="http://www.cnn.com/travel">travel</a> -- from stunning lakes and endless rolling plains to the snow-capped Himalayas in the north. It's also home to wild festivals, romantic mausoleums and some of the most hectic cities in the world.</span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_58B4E0CF-469E-4A3A-D1CF-CB6E088847A1"><span>To get a small idea of its splendor, check out our photo gallery featuring 30 spectacular scenes travelers to India will want to see. </span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_E7F25FF7-6834-2D5E-0841-CF679D0B2188"><span>Admittedly we've barely even scratched the surface of the incredible country of India, but here's a selection of some of its most beautiful places.</span></div><div class="Paragraph__component Article__footer"><span>Maggie Wong is a freelance writer based in London.</span></div></div></div><div class="Article__contentTail"><div class="Zone__component Article__zone Article__contentTailZone"><div class="lazyload-placeholder" style="height:100%"></div></div><div class="Zone__component Article__zone Article__promo"><div class="PromoBestBeaches__component"><a class="" href="//www.cnn.com/interactive/travel/best-beaches" target="_self"><div class="PromoBestBeaches__content"><span class="PromoBestBeaches__titleTop">A year of the world's</span><span class="PromoBestBeaches__beaches">Best Beaches</span><span class="PromoBestBeaches__titleBottom">There's a perfect beach for every week of the year. Join us on a 12-month journey to see them all</span><div class="Button__component Button__light Button__WHITE PromoBestBeaches__button"><span class="Button__ctaText">Go to the best beaches</span></div></div><div class="PromoBestBeaches__wrapper"><div class="Image__component PromoBestBeaches__heroImage Image__hasAspectRatio" style="padding-top:56.25%"><img alt="" class="Image__image" the backdrop -- is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The valley comes alive with blossoms during hotter months. The best time to visit is between July and October. It was constructed with an interlocking system of bricks -- without using any girders and beams. The massive arched hall is one of the largest in the world with a roof unsupported by any pillars. The top of the iconic landmark offers panoramic views of the city."],"imageAlt":"Beautiful India Lucknow Bara Imambara487283720","imageUrl":"//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/170117153029-beautiful-india-lucknow-bara-imambara487283720-super-169.jpg","label":"","galleryTitle":"","head":"","source":"Getty","photographer":"SANJAY KANOJIA/AFP/AFP/Getty Images","cuts":{"mini":{"width":220,"type":"jpg","uri":"//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/170117153029-beautiful-india-lucknow-bara-imambara487283720-small-169.jpg","height":124},"xsmall":{"width":307,"type":"jpg","uri":"//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/170117153029-beautiful-india-lucknow-bara-imambara487283720-medium-plus-169.jpg","height":173},"small":{"width":460,"type":"jpg","uri":"//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/170117153029-beautiful-india-lucknow-bara-imambara487283720-large-169.jpg","height":259},"medium":{"width":780,"type":"jpg","uri":"//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/170117153029-beautiful-india-lucknow-bara-imambara487283720-exlarge-169.jpg","height":438},"large":{"width":1100,"type":"jpg","uri":"//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/170117153029-beautiful-india-lucknow-bara-imambara487283720-super-169.jpg","height":619},"full16x9":{"width":1600,"type":"jpg","uri":"//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/170117153029-beautiful-india-lucknow-bara-imambara487283720-full-169.jpg","height":900},"mini1x1":{"width":120,"type":"jpg","uri":"//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/170117153029-beautiful-india-lucknow-bara-imambara487283720-small-11.jpg","height":120}},"responsiveImage":true,"originalImageUrl":"//cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/170117153029-beautiful-india-lucknow-bara-imambara487283720.jpg"}},{"contentType":"image","type":"element","cutFormat":"16:9","elementContents":{"caption":["<strong>Harmandir Sahib, Amritsar, Punjab:</strong> Harmandir Sahib is a holy complex for Sikhs that includes the signature \"Golden Temple,\" which sits in the middle of a large lake.
